emulator.core.cpu

Class Flags

  • java.lang.Object
    • emulator.core.cpu.Flags

  • public class Flags
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the flag bits and calculates when they should be set/unset.
    Author:
    Daniel Simpkins

      • setFlags

        public void setFlags(int initial,
                     int result,
                     boolean size,
                     int flagbit)
        Sets the flags accordingly to their definitions.
        Parameters:
        initial - Value before operation was performed.
        result - Value post operation.
        size - If set, 16-values are used.
        flagbit - Flags to test.

        Generated status flag
